title: Spellbook of knock
data:
| [spellbook](/wiki/Spellbook "Spellbook") of +   knock   [![Light green spellbook.png](/images/7/7d/Light_green_spellbook.png)](/wiki/File:Light_green_spellbook.png) |                                                               |
| -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------- |
| Appearance                                                                                                                                                           | [random](/wiki/Randomised_appearance "Randomised appearance") |
| Abundance                                                                                                                                                            | [3.56%](/wiki/Spellbook#Generation "Spellbook")               |
|                                                                                                                                                                      |                                                               |
| Base price                                                                                                                                                           | 100 [zm](/wiki/Zorkmid "Zorkmid")                             |
| Weight                                                                                                                                                               | [50](/wiki/Weight "Weight")                                   |
| Turns to read                                                                                                                                                        | 1                                                             |
| Ink to write                                                                                                                                                         | [5–9](/wiki/Magic_marker "Magic marker")                      |
|                                                                                                                                                                      |                                                               |
| Spell type                                                                                                                                                           | [matter](/wiki/Matter_spells "Matter spells")                 |
| Level                                                                                                                                                                | 1                                                             |
| Power cost                                                                                                                                                           | 5 [Pw](/wiki/Power "Power")                                   |
| Direction                                                                                                                                                            | beam                                                          |
| Equivalent                                                                                                                                                           | [wand of opening](/wiki/Wand_of_opening "Wand of opening")    |

In *[NetHack](/wiki/NetHack "NetHack")*, the **spellbook of knock** allows you to learn the **spell of knock**.

[ ]

## Contents

- [1 Effects](#Effects)
- [2 Strategy](#Strategy)
- [3 SLASH'EM](#SLASH.27EM)
- [4 See also](#See_also)
- [5 Reference](#Reference)

## Effects

The effect is the exact same as a [wand of opening](/wiki/Wand_of_opening "Wand of opening"), and will unlock doors and [containers](/wiki/Container "Container"), as well as revealing hidden doors.[\[1\]](#cite_note-1)

## Strategy

Since a [lock pick](/wiki/Lock_pick "Lock pick") or [skeleton key](/wiki/Skeleton_key "Skeleton key") can unlock doors with no power cost, this spell is considered almost useless, and the spellbook is usually thrown away, [polypiled](/wiki/Polypile "Polypile"), or [overwritten](/wiki/Magic_marker "Magic marker"). However, it has many other uses besides the obvious: as a [matter spell](/wiki/Matter_spell "Matter spell"), it can be used to train for casting more powerful spells in the school, notably [polymorph](/wiki/Spellbook_of_polymorph "Spellbook of polymorph"). It can also expose secret doors whose locations are known to the player but not the character (especially on special levels), and can open the [Castle](/wiki/Castle "Castle") [drawbridge](/wiki/Drawbridge "Drawbridge") without needing an instrument to play the [passtune](/wiki/Passtune "Passtune").

Casting knock also unlocks doors at a distance and does so slightly faster than a key would manage; because of this, it might be useful on the [Astral Plane](/wiki/Astral_Plane "Astral Plane"), though a [wand of digging](/wiki/Wand_of_digging "Wand of digging") is better because it will raze the doors. The spell also causes engulfing monsters to expel you, making it useful on the [Plane of Air](/wiki/Plane_of_Air "Plane of Air"). It can also free you from most kinds of "holding traps"[\[2\]](#cite_note-2), including [bear traps](/wiki/Bear_trap "Bear trap"), [webs](/wiki/Web "Web"), [pits](/wiki/Pit "Pit"), buried [iron ball](/wiki/Punishment "Punishment"), or being [stuck in the floor](/wiki/Lava "Lava").[\[3\]](#cite_note-3) Technically it can also free you from being stuck in [lava](/wiki/Lava "Lava"), but usually you will immediately start sinking again (unless you're e.g. [levitating](/wiki/Levitating "Levitating")).

## SLASH'EM

In [SLASH'EM](/wiki/SLASH%27EM "SLASH'EM"), there are new indestructible doors at the top level of [Vlad's Tower](/wiki/Vlad%27s_Tower "Vlad's Tower"). This spell has no effect on them, there is no message, and nothing happens.

## See also

- [Spellbook of wizard lock](/wiki/Spellbook_of_wizard_lock "Spellbook of wizard lock")

## Reference

1. [↑](#cite_ref-1) [spell.c in NetHack 3.4.3, line 859](/wiki/Source:NetHack_3.4.3/spell.c#line859 "Source:NetHack 3.4.3/spell.c")
2. [↑](#cite_ref-2) [src/zap.c in NetHack 3.6.1, line 2744](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/blob/NetHack-3.6.1_Release/src/zap.c#L2744)
3. [↑](#cite_ref-3) [src/trap.c in NetHack 3.6.6, line 4617](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/blob/NetHack-3.6.6_Released/src/trap.c#L4617)

- *This page is a **[stub](/wiki/Category:Stubs "Category:Stubs")**. Should you wish to do so, you can contribute by [**expanding this page**.](https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Spellbook_of_knock\&action=edit)*

[![This article has been updated to reflect NetHack 3.6.4. Click here for more information.](/images/3/37/Nh364-icon.png)](/wiki/NetHackWiki:Next_version "This article has been updated to reflect NetHack 3.6.4. Click here for more information.")

**This page may need to be updated for the [current version](/wiki/Current_version "Current version") of *NetHack*.**

It may contain text specific to [NetHack 3.6.4](/wiki/NetHack_3.6.4 "NetHack 3.6.4"). Information on this page may be out of date.

**Editors:** After reviewing this page and making necessary edits, please change the {{nethack-364}} tag to the current version's tag or {{noversion}} as appropriate.
html:
Spellbook of knock

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
spellbook of
+   knock  
Appearance random
Abundance 3.56%
Base price 100 zm
Weight 50
Turns to read 1
Ink to write 5–9
Spell type matter
Level 1
Power cost 5 Pw
Direction beam
Equivalent wand of opening

In NetHack, the spellbook of knock allows you to learn the spell of knock.

Contents

  • 1 Effects
  • 2 Strategy
  • 3 SLASH'EM
  • 4 See also
  • 5 Reference

Effects

The effect is the exact same as a wand of opening, and will unlock doors and containers, as well as revealing hidden doors.[1]

Strategy

Since a lock pick or skeleton key can unlock doors with no power cost, this spell is considered almost useless, and the spellbook is usually thrown away, polypiled, or overwritten. However, it has many other uses besides the obvious: as a matter spell, it can be used to train for casting more powerful spells in the school, notably polymorph. It can also expose secret doors whose locations are known to the player but not the character (especially on special levels), and can open the Castle drawbridge without needing an instrument to play the passtune.

Casting knock also unlocks doors at a distance and does so slightly faster than a key would manage; because of this, it might be useful on the Astral Plane, though a wand of digging is better because it will raze the doors. The spell also causes engulfing monsters to expel you, making it useful on the Plane of Air. It can also free you from most kinds of "holding traps"[2], including bear traps, webs, pits, buried iron ball, or being stuck in the floor.[3] Technically it can also free you from being stuck in lava, but usually you will immediately start sinking again (unless you're e.g. levitating).

SLASH'EM

In SLASH'EM, there are new indestructible doors at the top level of Vlad's Tower. This spell has no effect on them, there is no message, and nothing happens.

See also

  • Spellbook of wizard lock

Reference

  1. ↑ spell.c in NetHack 3.4.3, line 859
  2. ↑ src/zap.c in NetHack 3.6.1, line 2744
  3. ↑ src/trap.c in NetHack 3.6.6, line 4617

This page may need to be updated for the current version of NetHack.

It may contain text specific to NetHack 3.6.4. Information on this page may be out of date.

rawPage:
{{spellbook|name=knock|level=1|type=matter|turns=1|direction=beam|equiv=[[wand of opening]]|abundance=3.56%}}

In ''[[NetHack]]'', the '''spellbook of knock''' allows you to learn the '''spell of knock'''.

==Effects==
The effect is the exact same as a [[wand of opening]], and will unlock doors and [[container]]s, as well as revealing hidden doors.{{refsrc|spell.c|859}}

==Strategy==
Since a [[lock pick]] or [[skeleton key]] can unlock doors with no power cost, this spell is considered almost useless, and the spellbook is usually thrown away, [[polypile]]d, or [[magic marker|overwritten]]. However, it has many other uses besides the obvious: as a [[matter spell]], it can be used to train for casting more powerful spells in the school, notably {{spell of|polymorph}}. It can also expose secret doors whose locations are known to the player but not the character (especially on special levels), and can open the [[Castle]] [[drawbridge]] without needing an instrument to play the [[passtune]].

Casting knock also unlocks doors at a distance and does so slightly faster than a key would manage; because of this, it might be useful on the [[Astral Plane]], though a [[wand of digging]] is better because it will raze the doors. The spell also causes engulfing monsters to expel you, making it useful on the [[Plane of Air]]. It can also free you from most kinds of "holding traps"{{refsrc|src/zap.c|2744|nethack=3.6.1}}, including [[bear trap]]s, [[web]]s, [[pit]]s, buried [[punishment|iron ball]], or being [[lava|stuck in the floor]].{{refsrc|src/trap.c|4617|nethack=3.6.6}}  Technically it can also free you from being stuck in [[lava]], but usually you will immediately start sinking again (unless you're e.g. [[levitating]]).

==SLASH'EM==
In [[SLASH'EM]], there are new indestructible doors at the top level of [[Vlad's Tower]]. This spell has no effect on them, there is no message, and nothing happens.

==See also==
*[[Spellbook of wizard lock]]

==Reference==
